txt.en: 'There are too many Orcs to dislodge from the city with but one assault... we must retreat and recuperate for the next assault.'
'Let us return to camp... we will prepare for another assault.'
Instance: Unbridled Wrath
'Justice for Thornhope!'
<rgb=#00FF00>You have a moment to rest</rgb>
'Rest? There is no rest in this accursed ruin! To battle! For justice!'
<rgb=#00FF00>You may take a moment to rest</rgb>
'It is over! I have not the strength to see this through, This... this is where my family perished....'
<rgb=#00FF00>You have earned another respite</rgb>
'I will not falter again, my Thane!'
Béortnoth wishes to speak with you.
<rgb=#FF0000>There are too many enemies to push out of Thornhope</rgb>
Fight alongside Béortnoth and Wadel on the first leg of the attack.
<rgb=#FF0000>Béortnoth has been defeated</rgb>
Fight alongside Béortnoth and Wadel on the second leg of the assault.
<rgb=#FF0000>Wadel has been defeated</rgb>
Fight alongside Béortnoth and Wadel on the third leg of the assault.
Fight alongside Béortnoth and Wadel on the fourth leg of the assault.
Speak with Béortnoth.
'Nay, Wadel! We are too close to give up now! We must continue! Justice will be served!'
Talk to Béortnoth
Fight alongside Béortnoth and Wadel on the first leg of the attack
Fight alongside Béortnoth and Wadel on the second leg of the assault
Fight alongside Béortnoth and Wadel on the third leg of the assault
Fight alongside Béortnoth and Wadel on the fourth leg of the assault
Talk to Béortnoth
'Once again, you are right, Wadel... there is no safety in Thornhope. We must press on!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Béortnoth must survive the assault</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Wadel must survive the assault</rgb>
'Death to the Orcs!'
You have accompanied Thane Béortnoth and Wadel of Thornhope into the ruins of their village to wreak vengeance upon the Orcs there.
'Why do we wait? Let us bring death to the foe!'
'We must rest for a moment, but not for long. We have much to do....'
'We have taken the Mead Hall -- or what is left of it -- for the moment. Let us rest here.'
'We have brought at least some justice to those beasts which murdered Wadel's family and mine, but this battle is not over yet!'
'We have done well, but there are too many Orcs for one assault....'
'You are right, Wadel. Let us press on!'
'Let us bring death and ruin to the destroyers! Let us take blood for the blood of the fallen! Let the waters run black with the grume of the Orcs!'
